UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: The Antimicrobial Peptide Capitellacin: Chemical Synthesis of Analogues to Probe the Role of Disulphide Bridges and Their Replacement with Vinyl Sulphides.
Literature.Author: Shepperson OA, Harris PWR, Brimble MA, Cameron AJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=>64µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(no activity data),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa SVB-B9(MIC=>64µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(no activity data),Candida albicans SC5314(MIC=>64µM)
